pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$()$(br)Increases jump height and reduces fall damage up to a maximum of 18.5 blocks and 85% fall resistance.$(br2)Can be disabled by holding crouch and jumping.$(br2)$(bold)Trained By:$()$(br)Jumping$(br2)$(bold)Maximum Level:$() 10
